SA05nrat_4_u:1_0: ācaran stūyate tasmāt kṛcchrād vetti kṣamā 'kṣamaṃ // RATNA_04.01
SA05nrat_4_u:2_0: anyo 'pi tāvad yaḥ kaścid durvacaḥ kṣamam apriyam /

SA05nrat_4_u:4_0: tvatkṛtād eva tu snehāj jagatām anukampayā /

SA05nrat_4_u:7_0: vācya ity āha bhagavāṃs tad evam abhidhīyase // RATNA_04.04

SA05nrat_4_u:10_0: tasya me vadato vākyaṃ tvam ihāmutra ca kṣamaṃ /

SA05nrat_4_u:17_0: udārakarmaṇaḥ sarvam udāraṃ jāyate phalam // RATNA_04.09

SA05nrat_4_u:21_0: mṛtyasyāpy apraśasyatvād rājaṃs tad akṛtaṃ varam // RATNA_04.11
SA05nrat_4_u:23_0: utsāhaghnaṃ ca mandānāṃ sarvasvenāpi kāraya // RATNA_04.12
SA05nrat_4_u:25_0: dharme niyuktaṃ yāty eva purastāt sarvam eva tat // RATNA_04.13
SA05nrat_4_u:27_0: kiṃ pūrvakasya dharmāya sukhāya yaśase 'pi vā // RATNA_04.14
SA05nrat_4_u:28_0: bhuktād arthād iha sukhaṃ dattāt pāratrikaṃ sukham /

SA05nrat_4_u:30_0: vinaśyan sacivair dātum asvātantryān na śakyasi /
SA05nrat_4_u:32_0: sarvasvenāpy ataḥ svasthaḥ śīghraṃ dharmāspadaṃ kuru /
SA05nrat_4_u:35_0: devadroṇyādayas te 'pi pravartyantāṃ yathā sthitāḥ // RATNA_04.18
SA05nrat_4_u:37_0: sarvakṣamair akalahair bhajyeraṃs taiḥ sado(dya)taiḥ // RATNA_04.19
SA05nrat_4_u:39_0: te 'py annapānaṃ sāmyena labherann avighaṭṭitāḥ // RATNA_04.20
SA05nrat_4_u:43_0: alubdhaṃ paṇḍitaṃ dharmyaṃ kuru teṣām abādhakaṃ // RATNA_04.22
SA05nrat_4_u:44_0: nītijñān dhārmikān snigdhān śucīn bhaktān akātarān /

SA05nrat_4_u:46_0: akṣudrāṃs tyāginaḥ śūrān snigdhān sambhoginaḥ sthirān /

SA05nrat_4_u:55_0: yathā rājyaṃ ca dharmaś ca bhavet tava tathā śṛṇu // RATNA_04.28
SA05nrat_4_u:57_0: sametā bahavo nityaṃ santu te kāryadarśinaḥ // RATNA_04.29
SA05nrat_4_u:59_0: kārunyārdraḥ sadā bhūtvā tvam anugrahavān bhava // RATNA_04.30

SA05nrat_4_u:66_0: yeṣv amokṣaṇacittaṃ te jāyate teṣv asaṃvaraḥ /

SA05nrat_4_u:68_0: [ 16b ] yāvac ca na vimucyeraṃs tāvat syuḥ sukhabandhanāḥ /

SA05nrat_4_u:72_0: vimṛśya saṃyag vijñāya praduṣṭān ghātakān api /

SA05nrat_4_u:74_0: svatantraḥ paśya sarvaṃ ca viṣayaṃ cāracakṣuṣā /
SA05nrat_4_u:75_0: nityāpramattaḥ smṛtimān kuru kāryaṃ ca dhārmikaṃ // RATNA_04.38
SA05nrat_4_u:77_0: udārair anurūpais tu śeṣān api yathāvidhi // RATNA_04.39

SA05nrat_4_u:95_0: lokasya sukhasarvasvaṃ vyartham etad ato 'rthataḥ // RATNA_04.48

SA05nrat_4_u:102_0: jānīte viṣayaṃ yaṃ yaṃ yena yenendriyeṇa ca /

SA05nrat_4_u:105_0: upalabhya vyatītasya kalpayan manyate sukhaṃ // RATNA_04.53
SA05nrat_4_u:106_0: ekam arthaṃ vijānāti yady apy ekam ihendriyaṃ /

SA05nrat_4_u:138_0: guṇākaraṃ mahāyānaṃ tad dveṣī tena dahyate // RATNA_04.70

SA05nrat_4_u:142_0: duḥkhenāpy ahitaṃ hanyād ity ukte kiṃ virudhyate // RATNA_04.72
SA05nrat_4_u:144_0: hitaṃ hitamanāḥ kurvan duḥkenāpy ahitaṃ kathaṃ // RATNA_04.73
SA05nrat_4_u:145_0: duḥkham apy āyatīpathyaṃ kāryaṃ kimu sukhaṃ hitaṃ /

SA05nrat_4_u:151_0: apathyam api yad dṛṣṭaṃ tat pathyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ kvacit /

SA05nrat_4_u:154_0: uktā yatra mahāyāne kas tan nindet sacetanaḥ // RATNA_04.78

SA05nrat_4_u:182_0: mārgāc chrāvakasāmānyād bauddhaṃ kenādhikaṃ phalaṃ // RATNA_04.92
